quotes.quote: The Doctor: Don't blink. Don't even blink. Blink and you're dead. Don't turn your back. Don't look away. And don't blink.
She knows her timing, always knows. The time to strike or the time to starve. Her eyes as a clock, she watches she waits she learns, and in the second she blinks, she changes her mind just like that.
Here's to love at first sight, and here's to getting over it the moment you blink.
The time in your life can go by in the blink of an eye, so look for what lasts a lifetime.
Death is like that, it blinks, we blink; not always able to see the Stop signs, hiding behind trees in the corner of the roads.
The night is the blink of a day.
A blink of an eye is what separates you from reality.
If you think a blink and a wink are one and the same thing, you need a drink to enable you rethink.
What better way to connect with people than by staring and talking straight at them? Don't blink - that's one less connection you could have made.
Time goes by so slowly when you're a child, and then, as an adult, it goes by in the blink of an eye.
If I blink, I might lose her. So the last time I blinked, I lost you.

There is nothing that is faster or slower than anything else. Velocity doesn't exist; the eyelid has a time to blink just as the heart has a time to beat, and your leg has a time to knock this pipe out of my mouth.
So why don't we dance / Don't miss your chance, oh / Better not blink / You better not blink / Better not blink / 'Cause you don't wanna miss this
I don't want to blink, I can't close my eyes / These are the best years of our lives / I don't wanna sleep while I'm alive / I don't wanna miss a thing tonight
Maybe you think blinking is over-rated / But blinking stops your eyes getting dehydrated
So Blink! Blink! Blink! to show me that you are real / Blink! Blink! Blink! to show that you're alive / Blink! for all those mornings, the time that I've waited
In the blink, blink, blink of an eye / Oh your soul passes by / In the blink, blink, blink of the night / Am I ready to die?
Don't blink / Just like that you're six years old and you take a nap and you / Wake up and you're twenty-five and your high school sweetheart becomes your wife
Trust me friend a hundred years goes faster than you think / So don't blink
Do not breath too deep / And chance the moment / No way do not blink
I can not blink for fear / That you might somehow disappear  I will not blink
In a Blink of an eye that is when / I'll be closer to You than I've ever been / Time will fly, but until then / I'll embrace every moment I'm given
Don't wait too long  / Or she'll be gone fast as a blink  / Get on the ball  / If you love your lover  / No gesture too small  / Tear down the walls if you love her  / Just give it your all
Blink Blink, every time you open up your eyes / Blink Blink, every time you open up your mind
Cause it could be gone in the blink of an eye / It could be dawn in the blink of an eye / Isn't it time that you reached for the sky / And let yourself go
It happens in a blink / It happens in a flash / It happens in the time it took to look back / I try to hold on tight, but there's no stopping time / What is it I've done with my life
If you hear me, baby, blink! / Do you even have the capability left to think? / There seems to be a missing link / Everybody's had a chance to see how far I can sin
Play dumb, play dead / Trying to manipulate / You blink when you breathe and you breathe when you lie / You blink when you lie
If all my life / It were a blink of / It were a blink of an eye / I'd make the future the best thing if I only knew
Can you weather the storm or get wetta / Don't blink slow, don't think slow / Or you might miss the whole thing bro
In the blink of an eye / Seems like minutes as the years fly by / In the blink of an eye / Afraid to stop because I can't stop time
Don't blink / They won't even miss you at all / And don't think / That I'll always be gone
Oh, ride and ride, you riders, / Who rode ere I was born, / While blink-and-blink the star-dust / That blinks before the morn.
It's amazing in the blink of an eye you finally see the light.
A blink of an eye in itself is nothing. But the eye that blinks, that is something.
If you blink enough and relax a whole new world is opened to you.
Everything can change in the blink of an eye. But don't worry; God never blinks.
Enjoy every single day you get to lead because it will be over in a blink.

Nothing is ever truly set by fate. In one blink, everything changes. Even though it should be a clear, sunny day, the softest whisper into the wind can become a hurricane that destroys everything it touches.
In the blink of an eye, something happens by chance - when you least expect it - sets you on a course that you never planned, into a future you never imagined.
Life is a vapor. It passes in the blink of an eye.
In the blink of an eye everything can change. So forgive often and love with all your heart. You may not have that chance again.
Anything can happen in the blink of an eye. Anything at all. One. Two. Three. Blink.
I don't blink to live; I live to blink; mischievously flirt with nubile maidens; trespassing through a carpet of ingratiating mysticism; and incredulous enthrallment
Blind wet sheets / flapping on the lines… / sun in your eyes, / dark gold sun / full of little black spots, / you have to blink and blink…

If it be in the dusk when, like an eyelid's soundless blink, / The dewfall-hawk comes crossing the shades to alight / Upon the wind-warped upland thorn, a gazer may think, / 'To him this must have been a familiar sight.'
Blinking produces tears that help to keep the surface of the eye moist and clean.
Every time people blink, a tear leaves the glands. It washes onto the eye through tiny holes called tear ducts.
People blink a lot when they talk. A shyer character will blink more than a bold one.
If the character's startled and does a 'take' they might do a blink as the head draws back.
